SEARCH
Package koopa.cobol.projects

Class BasicCobolProject

java.lang.Object
koopa.cobol.projects.BasicCobolProject
All Implemented Interfaces:
CobolProject
Direct Known Subclasses:
StandardCobolProject
public class BasicCobolProject extends Object implements CobolProject
A CobolProject which only tracks defaults and returns them for all files. It will not resolve copybooks.

Provides a good base for other CobolProject implementations.

    • locateCopybook

      public File locateCopybook(String textName, String libraryName, File sourceFile)
      Description copied from interface: CobolProject
      The sourceFile is looking for copybook textName of libraryName. This should return the right file for that copybook, or null if it couldn't be found.

      The spec on copybook resolution:

      "The implementor shall define the rules for locating the library text referenced by text-name-1 or literal-1. When neither library-name-1 nor literal-2 is specified, a default COBOL library is used. The implementor defines the mechanism for identifying the default COBOL library."

      Specified by:
      locateCopybook in interface CobolProject
